description: Addressing a crowd of veterans and supporters in March 2008, Attorney General Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut said that he had served in Vietnam.
title: Blumenthal Says He Served in Vietnam
title_page: Blumenthal Says He Served in Vietnam - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Addressing a crowd of veterans and supporters in March 2008, Attorney General Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut said that he had served in Vietnam.
